#include<iostream>
using namespace std;
long long int catalan[1005];
 
void catalan_()
{
    catalan[0] =1;
	catalan[1] = 1;
 
    for (int i=2; i<=1000; i++)
    {
        catalan[i] = 0;
        for (int j=0; j<i; j++)
        catalan[i] += catalan[j]*catalan[i-j-1];
        
        catalan[i]=catalan[i]%10000;
    }
 
}
 
 
int main()
{   int t,n;
cin>>t;
 	catalan_();
while(t--)
{  
	cin>>n;
 
	cout<<catalan[n-1];
    cout<<endl;
}
    
    return 0;
}
